title: It's been over 24 hours and my friend has still not received his gifts
body: I gifted my friend over 24 hours ago and he still has not received it. Is this a longer wait time then usual?

replies.body: I double checked both yours and CHlMP's account, and all three of those skins are sitting safely in their collection. Have your friend check their collection, then try using them in a custom game, and if it's still not working have them submit a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with screenshots showing the skins locked so we can figure out what's going wrong and get them working!
